flavor_text: LATIOS has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head.This Pokemon is intelligent and understands human speech.
LATIOS will only open its heart to a TRAINER with a compassionate spirit. This Pokemon can fly faster than a jetplane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
Even in hiding it can detect the locations of others and sense their emotions since it has telepathy. Its intelligence allows it to understand human languages.
It has a docile temperament and dislikes fighting. Tucking in its forelegs it can fly faster than a jet plane.
